basic.blooming: Flowering period May-July, fruiting period August-October

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, resistant to half shade
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Apply plenty base fertilizer, apply little in the seedling stage, top-dressing chemical fertilizers in peak growth stages if needed
maintenance.pruning: Properly pruning to keep an elegant shape
